message.body: Hey guys. I'm still in FL and lost track of time... the Zoe sit is today, right? Just checking in to make sure all is ok.
Oh, ok. Thought Michelle was doing the lunch walk.
How was your Thanksgiving? You doing ok?
Just tried ringing her... maybe she forgot? Either way, if you can do it all the better. There should be cash on the counter which will be all for you. Unless M helps.
It was good I went to d s house, was yours good?
I'm going to head down to do the lunch walk now
It was nice. Family time. Kind of exhausted, but the sunshine feels good. I'll be back Sun night. Call Michelle if you need help with Zoe.
Ok will do
Have a safe trip back
Thanks! Let's go for drinks when I get back. Oh, and I still have that pack of tokens for you:-)
Nice txt me when u get back. Thanks!
Where do the aronovitz's usually leave the money for Zooey, I can't find it here
He said he would leave it on the counter. Maybe he forgot? I'll text them and find out.
Is everything OK with Zoe? Any problems leashing her?
She is tough to leash but no big problems. The money is not on the counter
I just texted them and will let you know:-)
Great thank you!

Arlene just texted me back. Apparently Arnie didn't remember saying he would leave the cash...? She said they can get to you on Friday morning. If you can't make it then, I can get it for you when I get back next week.
That's fine I may have you pick it up for me if you can. I just wanted to make sure the house cleaner didn't take it or something
Good thinkin'. I'm happy to get it for you next week if you can't make it over there. I'll be back Sun night and can meet Arnie on Monday.
Good that sounds great
I just spent an hour and a half trying to get the leash on Zooey. I think next time I'm going to pass on her walks unless she is leashed first
